website_summaries.verdict: Good sound/volume control paired with a customized exterior make these headphones perfect for kids with style.
pros: Mic works well enough for children to talk on the phone
cons: Some of the plastic pieces feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Great little headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 and a half boy. I tested them myself first. The quality of the materials seems good. The sound is pretty clear. The volume is nicely minutes when though I only have it halfway for my son. Maybe if used outside or in the vehicle in which the noises are louder I will probably raise the volume. The only issue is the jack which doesn't fit if you are using a thick tablet cover. You have to remove the protective cover to be able to insert the jack all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Great... Until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: Much like other reviews, the sound went out in one ear. Figured it was a connection issue with the iPad and case but just today I found out that wasn't the issue. Part of the plug below one of the black connectors broke off and now a piece of the connector is stuck in the headphone jack. I haven't figured out how to remove it yet and the sound is staying in headphone mode so my kid cannot use it for now. It's a shame because up until now they were great and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: fkato26

customer_reviews.title: Quality lacking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I liked the idea of the volume control on little ears, little person sizing, comfort. My kids are not allowed unsupervised screen time and an adult was almost always present when child was using the headset. Adult would plug in and remove headset for child. First pair broke within warranty period. New pair was sent without issue by manufacturer. The sound quality on the replacement pair was poor at first, but then just stopped working. I didn't bother reaching out for another replacement - just kind of seemed the product was not meant to be a solution for our house/standards.
customer_reviews.author: Jdenise

customer_reviews.title: Great little kids headset.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my kids, ages 6 and 3. They work great. They seem to be very durable and have stood up to occasionally being twisted, bent and crushed by my kids. As a parent, I like that the headphone jack unplugs from the headset. This allows faster untangling of the cord, and also allows the kids to run around with the headset and pretend that they are listening to music or talking on headsets without the cord getting tangled on everything. The Kids favorite feature is that the headsets plug into one another, however one of our two sets has a defect so we can only plug them into each other in a certain order.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Maiser

customer_reviews.title: Best part is the built in splitter (our kid never gets turned away for not having enough plugins)
customer_reviews.text: The headphones work great. The nice thing is that since it has the built in splitter, our daughter can always use it whenever she wants. In class, there isn't always enough "splitters" for the ipads but the teacher loves that ours has a splitter built in. So she can always have headphones whenever she wants (kids provide their own headphones). My 6 year old says they're durable and loves them. Will upgrade to 5 stars if they last a full year of school use but have only used them 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Broke but replaced by company.
customer_reviews.text: These were great at first. We purchased three and only one still works after 9 months. The other two pairs now only have sound in one side. Update: The company contacted me and replaced the two broken pairs. Excellent customer service! My kids love to use the "buddy" jack to plug in more than one set of headphones and listen together. (This doesn't work well if you plug in a regular, not volume-limited set of headphones at the same time, since the volume will be too low on the buddy-phones or too high on the regular set.) I also like the detachable cord that can also be used as an auxiliary cable.
customer_reviews.author: winstrel

customer_reviews.title: NOT Durable
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed these stopped working after 3 months and 6 days of use. Only used on the bus ride to school and back so my autistic son can use his tablet on the bus without disturbing the driver. FYI it was the cord that stopped working, we have temporarily fixed with an auxillary cord that came with our Beats headphones. Really so disappointed in the lack of durability because I wanted to love this product.
customer_reviews.author: smcomeau

customer_reviews.title: Durability - not for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in late September to replace a cheaper pair of headphones for school. My 3rd grader used them for 4 1/2 months before the wire broke. For those 4 1/2 months, we had no complaints. But for the price, I would have expected them to last the rest of the school year. These were never folded (they don't fold) and the wire appears completely undamaged on the rest of it. The area that connects to the "socket" is the weak point. For a child's product, this certainly does not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great kids headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered blue buddyphones from Amazon 2 days ago and they arrived today. My son is starting kindergarten next week and needed them for the classroom iPad. I was very impressed with the quality. They are very sturdy. I love that the cord isn’t too long, it doesn’t get tangled, and it separates from the headphones in case they get hung up on something. My son loves the color. He liked the stickers so much he couldn’t decide which one to choose, so he put the robot on one side and the monkey on the other. The sound quality is excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Neat Kid Proof Design
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 four year olds, one 6 year old, and one 7 year old grandkids who use these. I really like the limited decibels for the kids as I never have to worry and it is just loud enough for the kids to enjoy. Lucky these are bendable and durable. Kids tend to leave things in places where I sit and underneath stuff, so these will likely be tested for durability. Like the stickers that come with it too. Each kid will have their own headphones with its own look. Makes it easy to tell who did not put theirs away.
customer_reviews.author: Paintslinger

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 8 year old niece a pair of Buddyphones for Christmas mainly for my benefit. She was playing everything at high volume and driving me crazy! While doing some research, I wanted to find a pair of earphones that were “cool” so she wouldn’t mind wearing them as well as some that were a little tougher because she isn’t easy on anything. The volume limiting was just an extra plus! She has now had them for 5 days and really loves them! She got them in teal and the only negative she has though of is that she wanted pink! These earphones are saving my sanity and her ears 😊
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: 8yrs or younger
customer_reviews.text: I bought for an 8 yr old to have at school. She really likes them. I personally feel that the “ear pad” area is somewhat small and probably better suited for younger child. After 3 months of school use, one ear pad stopped working. UPDATE: The company is great and stand behind their warranty! They shipped me a replacement pair and another pair for doing an Amazon review (which in all honesty wasn't a positive review but they still stood behind their offer)! That's great service!
customer_reviews.author: PeaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great kids headphones, used on several trips so far
customer_reviews.text: We've owned these headphones for a few months now and have used them on two plane flights and a long car trip. They just fit my 2.5 year old, but she has a large head. It looks like they'll expand quite a bit. The volume is loud enough for her to hear the sound on an airplane (barely), but the goal is to limit the volume to protect kids' ears. So it works as described. The colors are cute and my kid enjoyed picking out stickers to personalize the headphones. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The BuddyCable has split on two of the four sets of headphones after my kids have used them every few days for a three months. I am disappointed in their quality for the price and even more annoyed that I cannot easily purchase replacement cables. I would not recommend these headphones even though I like the volume limiting feature.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie G

customer_reviews.title: Fun, kid-friendly, and they stay on!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought BuddyPhones for my 7 year old daughter. She had previously only used earbuds which I thought were better than headphones. After reading reviews of BuddyPhones online I realized this was not the case as I didn’t know about the volume levels recommended for children. My daughter was so excited for her bright pink headphones and decorated them immediately with stickers. She used them on a recent flight and loved them. They stayed on her head without every falling off (which happened frequently with earbuds) and the sound was great. We are huge fans of BuddyPhones—thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim scarfone

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old daughter to use to listen to her audio books without disturbing everyone. She loves the color and the stickers that go on the earphones. The volume is low, probably perfect for music, but I feel like it might be too low for audiobooks, if she were to try listen around a lot of noise. I like the fact that the cable is detachable because if it gets yanked, it will be cheaper to replace the cord, vs the whole headset. For all of our purposes they seem to work perfectly, and I appreciate the peace of mind with the lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for my younger child
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new headphones. She really enjoyed decorating them with the included bonus stickers! Overall, I like these headphones. They are well made and adjust small enough to fit comfortably for my 3.5 yo. My only caveat is they get louder than I expected. If the volume is turned all the up on our iPad, these headphones seem too loud. I was excited about the volume limit, which is really why I purchased these particular headphones in the first place. It's not too big of a concern since we can regulate the volume on the iPad. The pink color is nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Navin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old son, fits great and he really like it. Pros: -The cord is flat so it does not tangle -limited volume at 85dB is perfect, I tested myself and movies and games sound good. -You can plug 2 or more headsets in the same outlet -it is kind of flexible so my kid does not break it when taking it off
customer_reviews.author: agom

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving these headphones I was impressed. Well packaged and presented, and the ability to personalize them was exciting to the kids. I extended them to fit my head (adult male) without a problem, and validated the maximum volume output. It was reassuring to know that worst case scenario, my kids won't be bleeding from their eardrums at the end of a road trip. I then fit them to my 3 year old and 5 year old, and they fit easily and comfortably. One thing I didn't consider is how the audio jack would fit with the case on my kid's iPad Mini 4s; while it doesn't seat all the way, it does seat enough for fully functional audio.
customer_reviews.author: Ben&Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my granddaughter who's three. She loves the color (pink) and loves to wear them. We like that we don't have to hear her shows and have competing volumes in the living room. We also like that her ears are safe with the volume limited. Our only complaint is that it sometimes hurts her ears, but she is sensitive to that kind of thing and doesn't like headbands and so forth for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Cox

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THESE
customer_reviews.text: What a GOD sent it was to find these headphones. we are constantly asking him to turn the volume down, in the car, in the house, in the store while shopping.......THIS is the answer! They are small in size so fit properly on the child. One small issue however, the head phone covers do not stay in place. They fall off pretty regularly and it takes an adult to get them back on. We have the issue with only one side, so I am planning to contact the company and ask if this is perhaps a faulty pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Bendable is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are bendable! My daughter is ROUGH and I would think any pair the folds would easily be snapped and useless. These are great. Super comfy ear pads. Fun colors and STICKERS! Didn't even know it came with cool stickers to personalize them. They even have some your kids can color and some blank ones they can design themselves. So far the connecting cable seems sturdy and kid proof. Fingers crossed it outlasts my wild child.
customer_reviews.author: Ambelle

customer_reviews.title: cute and does its job
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 and half year old is very excited to use this headphones and apply the stickers. It fits her head well, and it does a good job of limiting the volume. I compared it with a regular earbud, when I play music at the highest volume allowed by my tablet, this product limits the volume at a loud but still acceptable level (I think this is necessary because I am testing at home at night, if using it on a train or plain with louder background, this level would allow the contents to be heard), vs. a regular earbud is at a super loud that you cannot keep it in your ear level.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: These are very kid-friendly, good choice!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome. After doing a lot of research on the best headphones to get for our five kids (ages 3 - 9) we decided these sounded the best. The idea of having a volume cap, without me being involved, is super. The colors and customizability of the headphones with the stickers add an extra touch of fun. They also like the "piggybaking" feature, for those rare times they agree on what to listen to! We homeschool, so these come in quite handy when the little ones want to listen to something while the older kids are still working. So the only thing that I am afraid of, is that they will grow out of them!
customer_reviews.author: Heffer

customer_reviews.title: He likes them and finds them comfortable and likes how they look
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are exactly what we were hoping for. First, the volume limiting is always on - we don't have to worry about our 4-year old trying to bypass the safety controls. He likes them and finds them comfortable and likes how they look. Some stress testing confirms that they are a durable design.
customer_reviews.author: Ameet Soni

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones, we need 3 more!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and so do I. Here is why: They fit her head perfectly. She is 6 and she can adjust them on her own to fit perfectly. We can plug additional ones together with the built in splitter. She loved customizing/decorating them with the stickers. They can be used with an iPad or a phone for calls or FaceTime with an answering button built in. They have a protective sound limits so kids can't turn them up too high. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Super Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Buddyphone headphones for my daughter for Christmas and she loves them. The colors really stand out and they are very comfortable for her small ears. I like that the volume is limited and will not hurt her ears. It is also a great feature to be able to attach another pair of headphones so that two children can listen to the same thing at the same time. Overall I am very satisfied with the purchase and would recommend BuddyPhones to anyone with small children.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: My Buddy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase of the BuddyPhones! Their bright color and customizable stickers are appealing, and their built-in volume control is perfect for our little grandchildren. I purchased the headphones for a kid's Kindle, and together, they make the perfect combination. I look forward to trying them with other devices. Thank you, onandoff!
customer_reviews.author: Pezmo

customer_reviews.title: Buddy Phones are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little earphones for my daughter. They feel well made and seem quite durable. I really like that they don't get too loud for little ears and the extra audio splitter lets us listen to movies on her tablet together. This will be useful on our upcoming plane ride. The earphone also came with cute sticker stickersets to personalize the earphones. Overall I highly recommend these earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe, light, easy-to-use
customer_reviews.text: We bought these headphones for our three-year-old and she has had no problems with using them. She can easily plug, unplug, and adjust the headphones herself. The detachable cord hasn't broken or frayed, and should be easily replaceable if it does since it's its own part. The sound quality is fine enough and softer, as one would expect. One downside to the larger shareable cord end is that it is difficult to fit through some device cases. Overall, though, they've been a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wojciechowski

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2nd pair of buddyphones! Our older daughter has a pair and they have worked great for over 2 years and counting. We just got a second pair for our younger daughter as we are heading out of town for a week and wanted to keep them occupied on the 4 flights. After reading many reviews on Amazon, we decided to choose the Onanoff headphones for our little ones' precious ears, and we have not been disappointed! They fit well and have weathered toddler playtime without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn W

customer_reviews.title: cord is very short, one side is already not working
customer_reviews.text: The positives: design is pretty, the splitter is an added bonus. Negatives: I'm afraid and I admit I don't know if it's because of the kids or the item, but one of the ear-cups is already not working (spekers) and it was only used a few times. Also, not sure if it's a safty thing, probably is, but the chord is a little short, your computer needs to have a socket in the front panel, so possibly it's better suited for mobile devices.
customer_reviews.author: Orli Grobler

customer_reviews.title: Not great for younger children
customer_reviews.text: The aux wire comes out so it did not work well for my kids. When we did reinsert the wire it had to be in a certain position at all times or it would not work and would have a garbled sound. It was difficult to consistently help my children with it. They seem to use it more as a toy and pretend to listen to something then what we purchased them for
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Watson

customer_reviews.title: Did not work in one earcup.
customer_reviews.text: Audio only works in one earcup. Even with a different cable and on different devices. I do not recommend these. Update: after about a month the jack for the cable on the headset broke. I took it apart and the plastic had broken free from the circuit board and had cracked. I do not recommend these for kids that aren't old enough to know they are fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my four year old son so he could listen to cartoons on the computer and he loves them. They are just his size, easy for him to plug in and he loves all the stickers that came with it. The volume remains low no matter the device he plugs it into. Love that you can plug another pair of headphones into these, so both he and his sister can listen to the same device at once - no more fighting. So far, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great volume limiting and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: We received these a few days ago and so far so good. We were hesitant that our little one would not keep them on, but he is loving it. They fit perfectly on his head, and the volume limiting is great and makes me feel reassured it will not be damaging to his ear. I like the sleek simple style and the option to spruce it up with a few options of colorful stickers. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: annie77

customer_reviews.title: Durable and a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of Buddy Phones for my 3 year old before going on a long road trip. I based my purchase off the recommendation from The Wirecutter. The price was excellent (varied by color so check them all before purchasing) and the quality is good. As my kid is normally very well behaved I didn't think the durability was too important but I was proved wrong shortly into the road trip and happy to say the headphones held up great. The dual headphone jack adapter being standard is a great touch and knowing I don't have to worry about the volume being cranked too high on accident is very reassuring. I would recommend these to anyone with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very Flexible Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these headphones. They have great sound and conveniently not loud enough to give our daughter hearing damage. I am happy that they have a good amount of flex to them because that was the first thing my girl tested out lol. I tried them on to see how comfortable the pads were and can say I'm pleasantly surprised that the material is not rough hard on the ears even after wearing for a while. I would recommend these headphones to anyone looking to get a resilient pair of headphones for a young child. They also fit perfect in my girls kindle fire 7 even with the case on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pick for Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Great pick for both our granddaughter and her grandparents. Product is very durable and survived a 10 hr road trip with her watching her dvd's. I actually purchased a pair for our grandson as well. Keeps arguments to a minimum when each kid can watch and listen to what they choose. They both loved being able to customize the look of their headphones. We loved that the decibels are limited as well
customer_reviews.author: G's nanny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product I Highly Recommend Them!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old son. It adjusts to fit him perfect. I love how they come with stickers so you can decorate them how the child wants. They also send you stickers that you can color! I love how you can customize them. They are very durable. One of the first things my son did was twist it. I am sure if it were any other headphones they would have broke. I LOVE the fact that the cord can be disconnected. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: KariR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these and I love that I know her ears are safe no matter how loud she turns the volume up. My daughter also lived picking out her own stickers for the side. Once these come off she will color her own sticker
customer_reviews.author: Christina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my pre-schooler a couple of years ago after a bad experience with some generic silicon ear buds (oops) and they have since survived multiple long-haul flights and being stuffed into my daughter's backpack (by her). She loves being able to pause and start videos on i-devices by herself, and I love the reassurance that they are volume limiting. She sometimes needs a little help getting the headphones in the right position on her ears, but once in position they stay on without the need for parental adjustment. The built-in socket for a second pair of headphones is a great feature for shared watching.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Nicholas Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have bought several Buddyphones for our kids, what we like best is: 1) durability of actual headset 2) customization with stickers and fun colors and 3) comfortable fit for kids. However, we've run into an issue with the cables. The actual jack that is inserted into headphone part is quite fragile and have snapped off. I contacted Onanoff and the customer service was fantastic. I got a super quick response, and was reminded of the warranty. New cables are on their way to us already! We are happy with the product overall and the complete experience (function and service).
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Luke

customer_reviews.title: Worth the small price for Mom and Dad sanity for road trips
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT! My three year old used them on our 22 hour car trip no problem. She also loved picking out the sticker for the sides. They held up very well being tossed around and generally "used" by her the entire way. She even chewed on the end when we weren't looking and it still plugged in and worked excellent! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: AvgJoe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working for Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: I bought the headphones in April based on Wirecutter’s recommendation. My children used them several times and liked the sticker choices, but after a few months reported they had stopped working. I tested them on multiple devices. For some reason they no longer work on EITHER of our Kindle Fires, but do work on other devices. AND other headphones work fine with the Kindle Fires. This is bizarre and frustrating because I bought them for my children, specifically to use with the Fire. I can no longer return it or exchange it because it's been more than 30 days since I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: product stopped working after a few months. Contacted the manufacturer via their website because they offer a 2 year warranty but have not heard back from them at all. poor customer ssrvice and poor quality. will not recomend anyone purchase these headphones for their kids. Edit: original email went to spam folder and was auto deleted. Company reached out to me and is sending me a replacement. I will update my rating once my son uses the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Really glad I got
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Do not look cheap at all. The ear padding is very soft. I also really like the option to hook multiple headsets together into the same device- it isn't something I would have thought to search for when looking for headphones- but it makes sense- especially for households that don't have oodles of devices or little kids that are ok with watching the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that durable, but kids like them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these headphones. We bought three for each child. We love the ability to plug them in with each other so they can listen to the same thing. These headphones are amazing. UPDATE: 2 of the 3 pairs have stopped working. So they don't last super long (I think these lasted about a year). But they were good for a while.
customer_reviews.author: GStrong2

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Update: after about six months of usage my opinion of these headphones is not as good. We've had a number of problems with the cords on a couple different pairs of the headphones from light usage, probably wouldn't buy them again. I still like that they limit the volume, but there are others that do as well. Original review: These headphones are great for kids, they come in bright colors and include adorable stickers so your child can decorate them and make them their "own." Both my son and daughter enjoyed having these for our long road trip this summer. As a parent, I love that they are child safe and have volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ranieri

customer_reviews.title: - Volume limiting is a great feature. Actually wanted it slightly lower for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Headphones seem durable. They survived in a backpack carry-on and a week of traveling. - Volume limiting is a great feature. Actually wanted it slightly lower for my 2-year old, but at least I know these cannot get too loud. - I really enjoy the in-line splitter so I can hear the same thing my child is. Worked great to help them through reading or educational apps Cons: - None yet
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: Flaky design caused failure in first minute.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging and headphones themselves are very cute. As soon as I plugged in another set of headphones, one of the sides on the headset stopped working. The "buddy" feature seems defective and causes one of the ear speakers to come & go depending on how you plug & unplug it. Hopefully this one is just defective, since I think my kids would love it.
customer_reviews.author: California Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my two year-old. We purchased them for a plane ride to use with her Fire Kids Edition. (She doesn't yet realize it works without the headphone- parenting win! :)) I'm able to plug in and listen along with her to help her play games, etc. They don't get too loud and fit her head perfectly. She was excited to decorate them with the rainbow stickers also!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jennings

customer_reviews.title: It only works with certain devices and it works well..
customer_reviews.text: They dont work with all devices..it works with his Nintendo switch but not amazon fire..his old tablet but not my s9 phone...I like them.just wish I new not comparable with certain things
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Gifford

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pair of headphones for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of headphones for my daughter. Not only is the sound quality great (love the limited volume as well) , but I love that there's an option to "share" sound by plugging in another set of headphones into the jack. Also, my kindergartner loved being able to personalize the headphones with the included stickers. One last comment, the cord is interesting in a good way - it's flat, which helps prevent tangling. This is an extremely well-thought out product that I would highly recommend, as it is every bit the A'Design Award Bronze Winner.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: These exceeded my expectations. They feel well made and can say I tried them myself and they were comfortable as well. The sound was good and I thought about keeping them for myself ( kidding- for my granddaughter's birthday) Thanks for such a nice set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, perfect for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Purchased these headphones for my 9yo daughter; she loved the color, the padding, and the sticker options -- and she could adjust it to fit her head. (Many other kid-sized headphones I've purchased for her in the past simply don't adjust well.) She's happy to put them on any time I ask -- much easier than arguing with her about speaker/sound levels when she watches videos on the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Stumme

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loved this.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a really durable headphone because my daughter destroyed all headphones we got for her in a day! But this is actually surviving for days...
customer_reviews.author: J. Dutra

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has sensitive ears and she loves these earphones. I would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Tony smith

customer_reviews.title: Not easily broken
customer_reviews.text: Great volume, strong at cord areas. My 3 struggles to adjust sometimes. Major down fall white ear phones can be taken off and are regularly by my three year old.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Gutsche

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 23 month old and she liked them. She would wear them even if they were disconnected. I really like the cord because it doesn't tangle up and the buddy jack that allows another headset to plug in. They came in very handy during an airplane ride. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: coconutsea

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought each of the grandchildren these headphones for Christmas, so I can only rate the delivery, which was on time and I was able to buy a different color for each child. They are foldable and so hopefully they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Frecklefacekid

customer_reviews.title: The fact that she can be pretty rough with them and they still hold up one ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought these for my daughter after she was gifted a tablet for her birthday. The fact that she can be pretty rough with them and they still hold up one of the amazing qualities for this brand. The sound quality for the limited volume is crisp and clear and she never complains about not being able to hear anything nor tries to adjust the volume manually which she's been known to do in the past. The colors of both the headset and the stickers are bright and eye catching which works wonders for her because she actually enjoys wearing them on car rides rather than removing them like her old pair she had.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: She picked them for the fun sticker options to personalize them
customer_reviews.text: A big reason I purchased these for our kindergartener was the safe audio. She picked them for the fun sticker options to personalize them, but they hardly lasted. She has been using them since August at school with iPads and came home today with the jack broken and stuck in the ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Durable, customizable headphones w/mic
customer_reviews.text: Durable kid's headphones with mic - just what my kid needs for school. She especially like the sticker customization & the headphones being smaller for her ears.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Z

customer_reviews.title: Work great & seem very safe.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for 2 upcoming flights with our 16mth old (although the recommended age begins at 3). So far she has just practiced wearing them in the house and seems to tolerate them for a minute or so at a time. We plan to continue practicing to increase the time. The bend-ability and volume safety features are as advertised. The only reason for a 4 star vs. a 5, is that I would prefer them to be able to fold up so they could travel easier.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: We've only had these headphones for a little over 24 hours, but it does what it says and I can no longer hear MySinging Monster's blaring from my son's tablet so I'm in heaven! As far as size goes, it's perfect for his head and can then be extended to fit an adult head. The volume is with in the limits as stated but I'm still figuring out if there is a way I can lock the volume so it can neither be turned up or down.
customer_reviews.author: cj123

customer_reviews.title: Great while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were nice for the months they worked. Then they just stopped. No obvious reason. No frayed wires etc. Just stopped working. They were also a little small around my toddlers ears and he would sometimes complain they hurt. I’m not happy I spent so much money on them. As a single mom, every penny counts.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Like that this ones came with "customized" stickers and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed to provide headphones for my 5year old at school. Like that this ones came with "customized" stickers and a blank canvas sticker to make very unique and different. I don't know about the sound quality since we just put some of the decal stickers and sent it to school. I did notice it has a headphone jack for someone else to hear what he's listening to or to just buddy up!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Veliz-Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We got them and the cord was much shorter than I would have expected. It would be fine for personal devices, but to use on a PC or shared DVD player probably not practical. They do seem to be well made and the customer service is great! They solicited feedback or the opportunity to address any of my concerns so I replied that we were disappointed the cord was so short and asked if there was a way to order additional cords for length and they sent one to me for free, no further questions asked. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: tMariee

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER LESS THAN A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 1st grade daughter for school and she just brought them back Friday to tell me they are not working anymore. I tried them and the cord has shorted and won't work unless they are manually pushed in and even then only one side you can hear! I bought these because I thought they would last and here we are, halfway through the year with having to buy new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Exposed cords and a bulky headphone jack made these a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.text: The headphone jack piece was too bulky to easily fit into our tablet with the case on. Also, some wires were visible on the side side of the cable where the rubber coating wasn’t completely covering the sides. We tossed these and opted for a Bluetooth model.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla E

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a bunch of research, we noticed buddyphones stood above the rest. The volume limiting feature and safe materials really helped us make the choice. After receiving the headphones, we were concerned our 2 year old wouldn't want to wear the head phones (he hasnt kept others on for very long). Much to our surprise he go right into picking his stickers and put them on to watch his favorite video. This will definitely come in handy on our next flight!
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Quality, quality, quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my 8 yr. old granddaughter and she loves them. They are a quality made product and easy to use. She uses them with her laptop and her iPad. Thank you for making such an easy to use, kid safety, (hearing), great quality, product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for little ones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are perfect for our little one. They are comfortable for her head at 2 years old, and the sound-limiting functionality works perfectly as advertised. The ability to link up to 3 other Buddy-phones together from a single source is fantastic and makes sharing movies on the tablet a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No sound out of one ear. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend. Not happy with these. They were good at first, but a year later both sets of headphones have no sound out of the right ear. Will not buy again and do not recommend wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not super impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to tell which part plugs into device. Stickers do not stay on well. Too big for my 4 year old, even on the smallest setting. Won't buy again. They do however coordinate perfectly with the Yellow Kids Kindle tablet case.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old was thrilled to get her own headphones. I like that they don't feel like they will break right away. She really likes the size of the ear part and how they adjust over the head. So far the quality is great for the price. She has used them for a week now. We are very happy with our purchase. Highly recommend this for little ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!! Great headphones for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these headphones for our now 2 yr old and he loves them but has been pretty rough with them. The headphones are very durable and comfortable for toddlers. He broke off the end of connection wire and I emailed onanoff to see if I could purchase a replacement wire and they sent me a replacement wire at no cost. They were prompt in their replies to my emails and we received the replacement wire within a week! Amazing customer service!! Thank you onandoff!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 yr old

customer_reviews.title: Innacuate photo color than what was received
customer_reviews.text: Photo of ones I ordered was a teal color. Actual headphones- green. Either put green headphones to match green or send the teal ones in the photo. Having teal pictured with green as the color is confusing and not accurate. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my second grader to have at school. She'll need a microphone next year, so I thought the microphone will come in handy next year, although I'm not exactly sure how if they'll work as you need to keep a button pressed down to work the microphone. My daughter really enjoyed choosing the stickers to customize her headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lynn Church

customer_reviews.title: For kids
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if these would be a good size for toddlers. I got them today and they are. The cool features are that they are made to bend, plug in multiple headphones, and have a sound limit. These are all good ideas for kids! I actually think my toddler won't destroy these!
customer_reviews.author: Average Person

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I use the headphone for my kids (aged 7 and 5) to listen to some music that they have to replicate with their instruments. The headphone effectively limits the decibels and I do not have to worry anymore that the music is too loud. I had to use the after sale support which demonstrated to be excellent! And I very happy with the headphones and I can only praise the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great compliment to new tablet. 6 year old gets great use. The only issue is the cord is removable and we have to stay on her to Lee track of it. Other than that 5 stars from us. We also love the variety of stickers to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Kelese23

customer_reviews.title: Loved these headphones
customer_reviews.text: We bought these before our trip to Disney and they worked great. Our daughter could watch a movie on the iPad and my husband and I didn't have to listen to it. We also used them in Disney not even plugged into anything, my daughter is scared of the noise the fireworks make so we put those on and it was enough to cancel out most of the noise so the fireworks weren't so loud and scary. My daughter is 3 1/2 and they fit her great, she also loved being able to pick from the decorative stickers to add. The headphones volume isn't that loud, but that was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a grand daughter for Christmas, so haven't used them yet. They look nice in the package and will be getting another one for another grand daughter. For now 5 stars as they look nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: NanaRita

customer_reviews.title: Great- cord length could be longer
customer_reviews.text: We just received the buddy phones and are thrilled, my only feedback is I wish the cord was a little longer for car trips where I want to have two kids in the back of the car connected to one iPad in the center that I am controlling. For hand held child use the cord length is great- so maybe an extension piece that can be removed or added?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Volume for kids is perfect. My main problem with previous headphones were the volume was way too loud for delicate kids ears. I also like that the easily breakable cords look like they can be replaced as they detach at both ends, although I have not checked to see if available or how much they cost.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for my 2 year old. She is not the easiest on electronics and so far they have held up to throwing and getting sat on. She really likes them and grins every time she puts them on.
customer_reviews.author: SweetRyoko

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are not only adorable but functional as well - bought them for a flight for my 2.5 year old to wear and watch a movie on the iPad and they worked great and stayed on too. He has a small head (15%) and so I think these would fit kids probably 18 months and up depending on size
customer_reviews.author: Styled237

customer_reviews.title: Great product, surprising affordability
customer_reviews.text: This is our first experience with head phones for children and it has been a good one. The BuddyPhones that we purchased are adjustable and so easy to use, even for our 5 year old. I love the fact that he can’t intentionally or unintentionally turn the volume up too loud and they seem so durable. He loves them because we don’t have to tell him to be careful with them, they are his own and he gets to customize them. We haven’t tried pulling the stickers off yet but that will happen at some point. Thanks for making a quality and affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: DadInTraining

customer_reviews.title: Great product that will be used for school.
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended these for my son. He will need headphones for kindergarten and I was looking at different ones for something durable. I like that these have a control so they can't turn them up too loud for their ears. My son (and also daughter tried them on) both said that they are super comfortable. They are excited about the stickers to personalize them and that they can both hook headphones up to the same device with the sharing port on the headphones. Will definitely recommend them for friends that need headphones for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my 6 year old daughter to be used at school. I wanted something that was durable, safe, and comfortable, and these buddyphones fit the bill. My daughter really likes them and likes that she was able to pick her favorite color and customize them with stickers. Since they do not play sounds over 85 db, I do not have to worry about her safety. These stay in her backpack and have held up very well traveling in it back-and-forth to school. I highly recommend these for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Z.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got these for Christmas. She used them one month and now you can only hear out of one side. And of course it's too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: BL1981

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! Finally my kids can use their tablets and I can watch my shows in peace. They are very comfortable; so much better than the earbuds that continuously fall out of their small ears. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lady_Soul

customer_reviews.title: Kids, Buddy Phone headphones
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for grandson to use with his new tablet and both boys use therm alot and really like them. They have great sound .
customer_reviews.author: M. Dunston

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: We love these headphones. We've been through a few pairs before with our daughter but preferred a pair with sound control. These have the sound control along with ability to 'share' with the extra port. These are also one fontrh few pairs we could find of plain yellow headphones! We didn't even offer her the stickers and she loves them! The flat cord is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones, my grandson loves them and they fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones, my grandson loves them and they fit his 3 year old head just great with excellent padding on the ears. They do limit the sound as advertised, it seems they are almost too quiet, but so far he seems happy with them. I tried them and even at the highest volume, they were very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: ZDC_Shriner

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for kids. Love that the cord is detachable so it doesn't get tangled up. Volume is perfect for the kids. I tried them on and they feel comfortable and my kids also love them. These headphone seem to be a lot more durable than other headphones I have purchased for my kids. My kids loved that they could put stickers on the headphones also. Only downside is that this one didn't come with a case, which is handy to have while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer,  WI

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase for young ears!
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift for a friend. Her little boy took to them immediately. They fit well and comfortable and the volume at max is tolerable and a fantastic idea for little ears. He is using them with his new kids version fire tablet and all of its great learning apps for preschoolers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Matchett

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, sticker options (daughter decided to use different stickers on each side!), the volume control of 85 db which is a safe level for kids, sharing option (we have twins so this will be very helpful!), and that it plugs right into the ear piece (so we don't have to worry about that cord pulling/breaking if the kid yanks on it, it will just unplug). There is a durability factor that is appealing so we'll see how they hold up!!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie G

product_meta.title: BuddyPhones Explore Non Foldable - Kids Volume Limiting Headphones - Built-in Audio Sharing Cable and in-Line Mic - Compatible with Fire, iPad, iPhone and Android Devices- Blue
feature_bullets: AWARD-WINNING SAFE AUDIO FOR KIDS: BuddyPhones are kids headphones with the most awards for innovative design and features. All BuddyPhones have built-in volume-limiting circuitry that protects kids' hearing. Capped at the WHO-recommended level of 85dB so they don't damage hearing. Engineered with certified safe materials that are hypoallergenic, super durable, and custom-made to be comfortable for kids to wear.

KEY FEATURES: Added comfort and convenience for little explorers that listen on-the-go. Built-in Safe Audio volume control protects kids' hearing. Space-saving foldable headband. Shareable audio cable. Great for girls, boys, toddlers, and all the kids, recommended for ages 3-10.

FUN FOR KIDS: We make safe audio fun for kids. Bright colorful designs. Custom designed sticker illustrations from the world-famous artists. Kids can listen with friends using the BuddyCable system. Up to 4 headphones can plug into 1 device thanks to a stackable audio jack.

BUDDIES FOR LIFE: We want to stay buddies for life. BuddyPhones are designed, built, and tested for durability that can withstand the strongest of kids. This includes quality control with world-class testing labs. But sometimes accidents happen! We offer Customer Service assistance to help with troubleshooting, repairs or replacements.

AMAZON BUDDY CLUB: Exclusive benefits for Amazon customers - Register online to join the Amazon Buddy Club and get member perks. Extend the standard #BuddiesForLife warranty to two years. Unlock an original BuddyBook full of fun content for the whole family. Be the first to know about special Amazon deals. Be a Buddy with Benefits!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars898 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
